languages.text: "Это правда. Последние пару десятилетий Леди Теодора приложила большие усилия, чтобы наладить крепкие отношения с флотом Осознание. И на Кьяву Гамма она искала технонаставника с особым тщанием, отвергнув дюжину кандидатов".

"That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."
languages.original_text: "Это правда. Последние пару десятилетий Леди Теодора приложила большие усилия, чтобы наладить крепкие отношения с флотом Осознание. И на Кьяву Гамма она искала технонаставника с особым тщанием, отвергнув дюжину кандидатов".

traits.locale_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora put in a considerable amount of effort to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor who would watch over Kiava Gamma."

"That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora put in a considerable amount of effort to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor who would watch over Kiava Gamma."

"That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

"That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

"That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

languages.text: 「その通りです。ここ数十年、シオドーラ様はコグニサンス艦隊との強い関係を構築することに苦心されてきました。彼女はキアヴァ・ガンマを監視する上での適切な技術監視員を探し求めて、たくさんの候補者を却下してきました」
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りです。ここ数十年、シオドーラ様はコグニサンス艦隊との強い関係を構築することに苦心されてきました。彼女はキアヴァ・ガンマを監視する上での適切な技術監視員を探し求めて、たくさんの候補者を却下してきました」

languages.text: “确实如此。在过去的几十年里，西奥多拉夫人煞费苦心，与真理开拓者舰队建立了牢固的联盟关系。光是寻找基亚瓦伽马星的管理者就花了不少心思，她亲自筛选掉了十几位候选人。”
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。在过去的几十年里，西奥多拉夫人煞费苦心，与真理开拓者舰队建立了牢固的联盟关系。光是寻找基亚瓦伽马星的管理者就花了不少心思，她亲自筛选掉了十几位候选人。”

languages.text: « C'est vrai. Au cours des vingt dernières années, dame Théodora a pris soin de nouer une relation solide avec la Flotte de la Connaissance. Lors de sa recherche du techno-moniteur idéal pour surveiller Kiava Gamma, elle a refusé des dizaines de candidats. »
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. Au cours des vingt dernières années, dame Théodora a pris soin de nouer une relation solide avec la Flotte de la Connaissance. Lors de sa recherche du techno-moniteur idéal pour surveiller Kiava Gamma, elle a refusé des dizaines de candidats. »

languages.text: «Eso es cierto. En las últimas décadas, lady Theodora se había esforzado por estrechar lazos con la Flota Conciencia. Rechazó a una docena de candidatos buscando el monitor tecnológico adecuado para cuidar de Kiava Gamma».
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: «Eso es cierto. En las últimas décadas, lady Theodora se había esforzado por estrechar lazos con la Flota Conciencia. Rechazó a una docena de candidatos buscando el monitor tecnológico adecuado para cuidar de Kiava Gamma».

languages.text: "Das ist wahr. In den letzten Jahrzehnten hat sich Lady Theodora sehr bemüht, gute Beziehungen zur Erkenntnisflotte aufzubauen. Sie hat auf der Suche nach dem richtigen Tech-Monitor für die Überwachung von Kiava Gamma ein Dutzend Kandidaten abgelehnt."
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist wahr. In den letzten Jahrzehnten hat sich Lady Theodora sehr bemüht, gute Beziehungen zur Erkenntnisflotte aufzubauen. Sie hat auf der Suche nach dem richtigen Tech-Monitor für die Überwachung von Kiava Gamma ein Dutzend Kandidaten abgelehnt."

languages.text: "Dediği doğru. Geçtiğimiz birkaç on yılda Leydi Theodora, Malumat Filosu'yla güçlü ilişkiler kurmak için büyük zahmetlere girmişti. Kiava Gama'ya göz kulak olacak doğru tekno gözetmen arayışında bir düzine adayı geri çevirmişti."
languages.original_text: "That is true. In the last couple of decades, Lady Theodora took pains to form a strong relationship with the Cognisance Fleet. She turned down a dozen candidates looking for the right tech-monitor to watch over Kiava Gamma."

traits.locale_text: "Bu doğru. Geçtiğimiz on yıllarda Leydi Theodora, Malumat Filosu'yla güçlü bir ilişki kurmak için büyük zahmetlere girdi. Kiava Gama'yı gözetlemek için doğru teknolojik cihazları arayan düzinelerce adayı reddetti."
